titleInfo.title: Max D. Barnes demo performances - Cedarwood Studios - 1972-05-17

mods.accessCondition: This audio file is the property of the Country Music Hall of Fame® and Museum and may be protected by U.S. and international copyright laws. mods.abstract: Various demo performances, as written and performed by Max D. Barnes (songwriter/performer), recorded on May 17, 1972, and engineer by Jed, according to job sheet, at Cedarwood Studios (Nashville, Tenn.)

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
